page.title: 13SHOPPING IN UPWEY
page.content: WE SAMPLED THE SHOPPING FACILITIES IN THE UPWEY AREA BY MEANS OF A SURVEY AND QUESTIONNAIRE.THE RESULTS OF THIS ARE OUTLINED BELOW: THE PLACES AS FOLLOWS : {1.THE MASONS ARMS}- PUBLIC HOUSE {2.UPWEY TROUT FARM}- SELLS TROUT {3.UPWEY WISHING WELL}- SOUVENIRS {4.C.T.HEATING}- PLUMBERS SUPPLIES {5. THE ROYAL STANDARD}- PUBLIC HOUSE {6. WEY VALLEY CARS}- MAZDA DEALER {7.GARDEN CENTRE}- GARDEN SUPPLIES AS CAN BE SEEN THE SHOPPING FACILITIES IN THE UPWEY AREA ARE RATHER SPARSE. THERE ARE NO GENERAL STORES OR FOOD SHOPS AS SUCH IN THE BLOCK, BUT SEVERAL DO EXIST ON THE EDGE OF THE VILLAGE JUST TO THE SOUTH OF UPWEY.
